GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v4.14.291
GSD.description:
netfilter: nf_tables: fix null deref due to zeroed list head

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.291 by commit 49d57fb1fd44b9d3422f096d3b1b6415685d7364, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit 55dd6f93076bb82aa8911191125418dcfcbf2c9b. For more details please see the references link.
